title: My Cute and Yandere Girlfriend - Novel Updates
author: 阑珊的灯火
description: Without realizing it, her figure has already became a part of my lingering memories. A few years later we reunite, she is still herself and I'm still me. Just like a few years ago her terror envelops me once more, however this time I will not run because she is my cute and yandere girlfriend.>
